text: aur us samay ko yaad karo jab ham har samudaay mein svayan usake apane logon mein se ek gavaah unapar niyukt karake bhej rahe the aur (isee reeti ke anusaar) tumhen in logon par gavaah niyukt karake lae. hamane tumapar kitaab avatarit kee har cheez ko kholakar bayaan karane ke lie aur muslim (aagyaakaariyon) ke lie maargadarshan, dayaaluta aur shubh soochana ke roop mein
